Who: SCOURGE, SCORPONOK - Hydras, Nightshift
Location: Black Fortress - Hydras' Throne Room

> Hydras Hissed in Pain and taking his gun he opened fireagainst Nightshift, he yelled "With the exception of the leadership, I'll grant one wish to the predacon that kill this SCUM and I'll promote him to the second in command rank!!!!"

Scorponok groaned as the attack from Nightshift struck home! Scorponok
was not the most agile of soldiers and so for a moment his optic
sensors were full of a spectacular array of scintillating colors. The
large Decepticon stepped back a pace as he braced his arms on the door
frame, his massive bulk now fully in the middle of it rather than just
in front of it.

"Cursed Autobot!" he raged, his autocannons moving back and forth.
They appeared ready to fire, but without his optics to guide them they
moved aimlessly.

Scourge, who had up to this point had his own weapons lock on
Nightshift, stepped away from the wall and towards the center of the
room, although still out of immediate melee range. "feisty" he said as
a cold smile curled itself across his lips, "that won't last long."

Scourge fired his stunner beams at Nightshift!

(TAG)

Preston
